summary: CMS Website Beheer consolidation fully tested. All features working: unified admin page at /app/website-beheer with Pagina's, Footer, Instellingen, and Design tabs. Public website dynamically loads CMS content for all pages.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/public/cms/menu returns menu items (Home, Over Ons, Contact, HRM)
Backend: GET /api/public/cms/page/home returns home page with Hero, Features, CTA sections
Backend: GET /api/public/cms/page/over-ons returns Over Ons page content
Backend: GET /api/public/cms/page/contact returns Contact page content
Backend: GET /api/public/cms/footer returns footer configuration
Backend: GET /api/public/cms/page/nonexistent returns 404
Backend: GET /api/cms/pages returns all CMS pages (requires auth)
Backend: GET /api/cms/footer returns footer for editing (requires auth)
Backend: GET /api/admin/landing/settings returns settings (requires auth)
Backend: PUT /api/cms/pages/{id} updates page successfully
Backend: PUT /api/cms/footer updates footer successfully
Backend: CMS admin endpoints require authentication
Frontend: Homepage (/) loads with CMS content - Hero, Features, CTA sections
Frontend: Navigation menu dynamically loaded from CMS (Home, Over Ons, Contact, HRM)
Frontend: /over-ons page shows CMS content
Frontend: /contact page shows CMS content with contact info
Frontend: Login (Inloggen) button navigates to /login
Frontend: Register (Registreren) button navigates to /register
Frontend: Admin can access /app/website-beheer
Frontend: Pagina's tab shows all CMS pages (Home, Over Ons, Contact, HRM)
Frontend: Page editor shows sections with edit/delete/reorder controls
Frontend: Footer tab shows footer columns, links, copyright, colors
Frontend: Instellingen tab shows company settings (Bedrijfsnaam, Email, Telefoon, Adres)
Frontend: Design tab shows color pickers for primary/secondary colors
Frontend: Save (Opslaan) button present on all tabs
Frontend: Preview button available for pages
Frontend: Sectie Toevoegen dropdown available for adding sections

website_beheer_page.description: Unified CMS admin page accessible via sidebar navigation

paginas_tab.description: Shows all CMS pages (Home, Over Ons, Contact, HRM) with Live/Menu badges

page_editor.description: Edit page title, URL, published status, menu visibility, and sections

footer_tab.description: Configure footer columns, links, copyright text, background/text colors

instellingen_tab.description: Configure company info (name, email, phone, address), logo, social media

design_tab.description: Configure primary and secondary colors for website

public_homepage.description: Displays Hero, Features, CTA sections from CMS

public_over_ons.description: Displays Over Ons page content from CMS

public_contact.description: Displays Contact page with contact info from CMS

login_register_buttons.description: Inloggen and Registreren buttons work correctly in navigation

context_for_next_testing_agent: CMS Website Beheer consolidation complete. Key points: 1) Single admin page at /app/website-beheer replaces old LandingEditor and CMSBuilder. 2) Four tabs: Pagina's (page management), Footer (footer config), Instellingen (company settings), Design (colors). 3) Public pages use PublicPage.js component that fetches from /api/public/cms/page/:slug. 4) Navigation menu loaded from /api/public/cms/menu. 5) Footer loaded from /api/public/cms/footer. All 17 backend tests passing, all frontend features verified.
